item.title: GM
item.description: score:99 Chances: The EV market in the US and China may see a resurgence in 2024 as new competitors enter the space and inflation begins to cool. China’s ability to expand its electrical grid system and take advantage of funding and infrastructure bill opportunities may drive growth in the EV market.
